description: This time, I just can`t take my eyes off of that certain area of that one dude... Check it out? Are you kidding me, of course I will! Now, I wonder if it comes off...?

titles.title: Flowering Distracted All of a Sudden by That Thing I Always See, Happens Doesn`t It?
Hana no Itsumo Miteru Mon ga Ki ni Naru Koto Aru yo na
花のいつも見てるもんが気になることあるよな
